entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Stettler
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:45 PM MST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -25.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Stettler 10:00 PM MST Friday 24 February 2023
Temperature: -25.1°C
Humidity: 67 %
Wind Chill: -37
Dewpoint: -29.5°C

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 28 with temperature rising to minus 23 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 28 with temperature rising to minus 23 by morning. Wind chill minus 39 this evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 8:17 PM MST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 8:17 PM MST Friday 24 February 2023
